title: Phantasmagoria: The Movie
overview: Three shocking tales of horror that will get you beyond fear. From the mind of the filmmaker Domiziano Cristopharo (House of Flesh Mannequins, Bloody Sin of Horror, Poe: Poetry of Eerie) and Mickael Abbate (Festival Director of "Samain du cinéma fantastique"), Phantasmagoria is a Franco-Italian co production.
storyline: Young married couple inherits an old Southern plantation, once owned by an eccentric 19th Century magician.
